landing.bio: I am a enthusiastic person and very determined to whatever work assigned to me. I have good potential in management work. My tech stack includes Python and Javascript. Python for server side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend. I use Mern framework for the server side development and React for the frontend development.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for handling all the technical functionalities.

education.university: D.G.Ruparel College of Arts, Commerce & Science

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. My sporting interest revolves around badmintion.
interests.paragraphTwo: I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
interests.paragraphThree: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
